data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Piñanez Espejo, Yolanda M. G., Kochalka, John A., Garcete Barrett, Bolívar R. (2019): A new species and two new records of the ground spider genus Apopyllus (Araneae, Gnaphosidae) from Paraguay. Zootaxa 4664 (4): 594-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4664.4.12|9 occurrences
